title: Chan Phuong Vegetarian
description: The food at this small air-conditioned restaurant is 100% vegan, however, they may offer drinks which contain dairy. Offer many dishes with mock meats. No MSG is used. They also have an English-language menu, and the owners speak English very well. Previously located on Le Hong Phong St.
streetAddress: 185 Hong Lac, P10, Tan Binh District
